name: The Persisting Adventure
description:
This is the sequel to The Creature's Game( which can be found at https://danielles-games.itch.io/the-creatures-game)  The story continues, and a new addition has been made.  Instead of a new Playtester, though, it's someone else entirely that's found herself in the game. 

This game currently has 3 endings.  Also, there are some areas where the screen will get a bit darker for a short time.  If there's anything else that happens, though, such as not being able to go to the next scene, let me know.
